texts.label: text
texts.orig: Remote work has fundamentally transformed how companies operate. Studies show that 73% of teams report increased productivity when working remotely, citing fewer distractions and better work-life balance as key factors.
texts.text: Remote work has fundamentally transformed how companies operate. Studies show that 73% of teams report increased productivity when working remotely, citing fewer distractions and better work-life balance as key factors.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: However, challenges remain in maintaining team cohesion and company culture. Leaders must invest in digital collaboration tools and create intentional spaces for social connection to sustain long-term success.
texts.text: However, challenges remain in maintaining team cohesion and company culture. Leaders must invest in digital collaboration tools and create intentional spaces for social connection to sustain long-term success.
